suncertify.presentation
Class BookingModelNwImp

java.lang.Object
  suncertify.presentation.BookingModelNwImp
All Implemented Interfaces:
BookingModel
public class BookingModelNwImp
extends java.lang.Object
implements BookingModel

This class implements the BookingModel interface and is used to represent the BookingModelImp class on the server side.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Robert Black

bookContractor

public void bookContractor(long recNo,
                           java.lang.String custNo)
                    throws RecordNotFoundException,
                           java.lang.SecurityException,
                           RecordAlreadyBookedException
This method books a contractor and creates a HashMap of record numbers and contractor records. Then notifies all listeners passing the updated HashMap of contractors.

Specified by:
bookContractor in interface BookingModel
Parameters:
recNo - the record position number.
custNo - the eight digit customer id.
Throws:
RecordNotFoundException - if the record is deleted or doesn't exist.
java.lang.SecurityException - if the record is locked with a cookie other than lockCookie.
RecordAlreadyBookedException - if the record already has a customer number stored in the owner field i.e. already booked.

Specified by:
isContractorBooked in interface BookingModel
Parameters:
recNo - the record number (file position).
Returns:
the Boolean object, false if not booked, true if booked.
Throws:
RecordNotFoundException - if the record is deleted or doesn't exist.
